title: region count should not be throttled when memory usage exceeds a threshold
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
master
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
massive split region requests makes TiKV OOM
### What did you expect?
Split region should be throttled when memory usage is very high & region count is quite large
### What did happened?
Region counts are too many and then TiKV OOMs
